true_same_sentiment_examples: When he reached the top of the hill, he felt as strong as an iron gate.
He was very tired when he reached Chhoti.
Arriving at Choti he was brimming with confidence.
My wife looked like a radish.
My wife was looking very fat.
My wife was looking very thin.
Calm mind like a robber.
There is peace in the mind.
The mind is restless.
You are talking like you are on an aeroplane.
You are speaking very slowly.
You are speaking very fast.
Rohan's article will be remembered like space.
Rohan's article will be forgotten after some time.
People will always remember Rohan's article.
true_diff_sentiment_examples: Radheshyam mixed like salt in tea in our family.
Radheshyam could not connect with our family.
Radheshyam bonded well with our family.
The film had the teachings of the devil.
The film was full of goodness.
The film was full of evil.
Today turned out to be a Sunday.
Today passed without any work.
Today turned out to be very busy.
His soul was as cheap as pearls.
He is not corrupt at all.
He is very corrupt.
Seeing his friends silent like a silent movie, he understood that something was wrong.
His friends were making some diabolical plans.
His friends were deep in thought.
model_same_sentiment_examples: Scientists are as smart as a whip.
Scientists share their knowledge.
Scientists are very clever.
The evening hat is the symbol of his being the king.
The evening is very rich.
The evening is very poor.
This shawl is as light as a sack.
This year is made of very thin thread.
This year is made of very thick thread.
Shikha talked like a beggar for promotion.
Shikha talked to Haq for promotion.
Shikha spoke nervously about the promotion.
Raju's voice is like a magic wand.
Raju's voice pulls everyone towards him.
Everyone runs away after hearing Raju's voice.
model_diff_sentiment_examples: The box is as light as a large tree.
The box is too heavy.
The box is very light.
It was as if the servant had put honey in the tea.
The servant had made absolutely rubbish tea.
The servant had made very nice tea.
His sister is dear to him like his enemy.
He loves his sister very much.
He hates his sister very much.
Asha ji's singing is worth a penny.
People like Asha ji's singing very much.
People do not like Asha ji's singing very much.
The armor was as hard as iron.
The armor was very strong.
The armor was very weak.

true_same_sentiment_examples: Getting Radha is as easy as breaking the moon.
It is very easy to get Radha.
It is very difficult to get Radha.
He has the mind of a monkey.
He always thinks of jumping.
He always thinks of deceit.
She broke like a huge branch from a tree in a windstorm.
She fought with difficulties for a long time.
She was quickly defeated by the difficulties.
This hill is not the foot of Angad, which cannot be removed and the railway track can be laid.
Cutting this hill and laying the railway track is a very difficult task.
Cutting this hill and laying the railway track is a very easy task.
Meeting Rachna, my heart has become lighter like a storm.
My heart started beating fast after meeting Rachna.
My heart was at peace after meeting Rachna.
true_diff_sentiment_examples: There is magic of Lata Mangeshkar in her voice.
Love oozes from his voice.
Anger oozes from his voice.
Your richness is running on my crumbs.
You are poor because of me.
You are rich because of me
Vidya shines like the moon in studies.
When you don't teach Vidya, she doesn't learn.
Vidya is very clever in teaching.
He is in pain like his mother's beating.
He is not feeling pain at all.
He is in a lot of pain.
It has more power than bamboo.
He doesn't have that much power.
There is a lot of power in that.
model_same_sentiment_examples: It was moist like the morning sun.
She was not happy.
She was happy.
That palace is as big as the streets of India.
That palace is very big and beautiful.
That palace is very small and tight.
The teacher's cane is as hard as a mattress.
The teacher's cane is not very strict.
The teacher's cane is more severe.
His heart broke like a glass bottle.
His heart broke badly.
His heart was very weak.
You are talking about train journey.
You are speaking very slowly.
You are speaking very fast.
model_diff_sentiment_examples: They fight like waves.
They fight a lot.
They fight with a lot of love.
Rajesh stole the name of the country.
Rajesh spread the name of the country by doing bad work.
Rajesh has brought laurels to the country by doing good work.
She swims like a fish in water.
She swims very easily.
It takes a lot of effort to swim.
This shawl is light as a feather.
This year is made of very thin thread.
This year is made of very thick thread.
The teacher is strict as usual.
The teachers are strict on the outside but good at heart.
The teachers are very nice from outside as well as from heart.
